recipesJson.name: Churro (EASY) [ Live Mixing ]
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is a traditional vapor Churro, one you'd find from any company on the shelf. 

Made on Live Mixing: CHURRO???

reviews.text: CDS is still pretty strong after a 3 week steep. Next time I'll halve it so I can taste more of the background flavors. It's not bad by any means. The cinnamon is front and center and I want to taste more funnel cake/ pastry flavor.
sorry dude but that doesn't taste anything like a churro.It just tastes like CDS period.
